recipesJson.name: lemon happiness
recipesJson.author: Jkilla
recipesJson.description: First original recipe i have created, I used cap lemon meringue pie because i like how well rounded it is. Fa lemon sicily and cap juicy lemon just to boost the lemon. tfa graham cracker clear for just a little graham cracker crust, and cap vanilla whipped cream because well who doesnt like some whipped cream on their pies. suggestions gladly welcomed, and just let me know what you think. also sweeten to taste i always like a little sweetener in my mixes just to help it carry onto the pallet.
